constituent: conspire, say, words, keitai, mouth, so-and-so, sweet, wicker basket, picnic basket, tree, wood
koohiiStory1: I imagine a clique of catty girls conspiring against a another girl...they are exchanging lots of words, chatting about how so-and-so girl is now up to such-and-such (gasp!), and how they will spread the word about it.
koohiiStory2: You might hear the words of someone conspiring... "If you do so-and-so...".
kunYomi: はか.る、たばか.る、はかりごと
readingExamples: 謀略 (ぼうりゃく), 無謀 (むぼう), 首謀者 (しゅぼうしゃ), 謀る (はか.る)
